mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Davey, David D.

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Davey, David D. Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Acute bronchitis. Result: Died 1865/04/22 of inflammation fo larynx, trachea and bronchia. Inflammation of synovial membranes right knee and elbow joints.
